com.coms309SS6.isuview.controllers

Class RouteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coms309SS6.isuview.controllers.RouteController

  • @RestController
public class RouteController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST Controller to allow the frontend app to request and receive routes within buildings.

      • handleRouteDataBetweenBuildings

        @GetMapping(value="/api/routingv3")
public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> handleRouteDataBetweenBuildings(@RequestParam(value="start")
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String start,
                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="end")
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String end)
        Get mapping to get multiple legs of a route between rooms, possibly between different buildings. Separates the list of routes by legs, so for a route from Pearson 2155 to Atanasoff 125 it would make a route from Pearson 2155 to the stairs, Pearson first floor stairs to the door, and the Atanasoff door to 125.
        Parameters:
        start - The starting building and room number. separated by a comma.
        end - The ending building and room number, separated by a comma.
        Returns:
        The list of legs for the route, with each leg containing the building name, floor number, and list of intersections in the leg.
